sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import useInputState from './hooks/useInputState'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Paper, ListItem, TextField, Grid, Button } from '@material-ui/core'

function LoginForm() {
    const [name, handleName] = useInputState("")
    const [password, handlePassword] = useInputState("")
    return (
        <Grid container justify="flex-end" alignItems="center" direction="column">
            <Paper style={{ width: "20%", padding: "2rem" }}>
                <form onSubmit={login}>
                    <TextField onChange={handleName} id="outlined-basic" label="Username" variant="outlined" value={name} fullWidth />
                    <TextField onChange={handlePassword} id="outlined-password-input" label="Password" type="password" autoComplete="current-password" variant="outlined" value={password} fullWidth />
                    <Button variant="contained" color="primary" style={{ margin: "1rem" }} >Login</Button>
                </form>
                <Link to="/signup" style={{ textDecoration: 'none' }} >Don't have an account?</Link>
            </Paper>
        </Grid>
    )
}

export default LoginForm
